vaccines.name: BCG
vaccines.description: Protects against tuberculosis. Given at birth or as early as possible till one year.

vaccines.name: Hepatitis B - Birth Dose
vaccines.description: Prevents Hepatitis B. Given at birth within 24 hours.

vaccines.name: OPV-0
vaccines.description: Protects against polio. Given at birth or as early as possible within first 15 days.

vaccines.name: OPV-1
vaccines.description: First dose of Oral Polio Vaccine.

vaccines.name: Pentavalent-1
vaccines.description: Protects against DPT, HepB, Hib.

vaccines.name: Rotavirus-1
vaccines.description: Protects against diarrheal diseases caused by rotavirus.

vaccines.name: Fractional IPV-1
vaccines.description: First fractional dose of Inactivated Polio Vaccine.

vaccines.name: PCV-1
vaccines.description: Pneumococcal conjugate vaccine to prevent pneumonia and meningitis.

vaccines.name: OPV-2
vaccines.description: Second dose of Oral Polio Vaccine.

vaccines.name: Pentavalent-2
vaccines.description: Second dose of Pentavalent vaccine (DPT, HepB, Hib).

vaccines.name: Rotavirus-2
vaccines.description: Second dose of Rotavirus vaccine.

vaccines.name: OPV-3
vaccines.description: Third dose of Oral Polio Vaccine.

vaccines.name: Pentavalent-3
vaccines.description: Third dose of Pentavalent vaccine.

vaccines.name: fIPV-2
vaccines.description: Second fractional dose of IPV.

vaccines.name: Rotavirus-3
vaccines.description: Third dose of Rotavirus vaccine.

vaccines.name: PCV-2
vaccines.description: Second dose of Pneumococcal vaccine.

vaccines.name: MR-1
vaccines.description: Measles-Rubella first dose.

vaccines.name: JE-1
vaccines.description: Japanese Encephalitis first dose (in endemic districts).

vaccines.name: Vitamin A 1st dose
vaccines.description: Vitamin A 1 lakh IU oral dose.

vaccines.name: MR-2
vaccines.description: Measles-Rubella second dose.

vaccines.name: JE-2
vaccines.description: Japanese Encephalitis second dose (in endemic districts).

vaccines.name: DPT-Booster-1
vaccines.description: First booster dose of DPT.

vaccines.name: OPV-Booster
vaccines.description: Booster dose of Oral Polio Vaccine.

vaccines.name: Vitamin A 2nd dose
vaccines.description: Vitamin A 2 lakh IU oral dose.

vaccines.name: DPT-Booster-2
vaccines.description: Second booster dose of DPT.

vaccines.name: OPV-Booster-2
vaccines.description: Second booster dose of Oral Polio Vaccine.

vaccines.name: Td (10 years)
vaccines.description: Tetanus and Diphtheria toxoid at 10 years.

vaccines.name: Td (16 years)
vaccines.description: Tetanus and Diphtheria toxoid at 16 years.

vaccines.name: Td-1
vaccines.description: First dose of Td given early in pregnancy.

vaccines.name: Td-2
vaccines.description: Second dose of Td at least 4 weeks after Td-1.

vaccines.name: Td-Booster
vaccines.description: Single booster if previously immunized within 3 years.
